### insert() {#a4e8659acb3cbdfe3499a5f95696e57a0}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void StableFunctionMap::insert (<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/stablefunction">StableFunction</a> &amp; Func)</>}>
Insert a <code><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/stablefunction">StableFunction</a></code> object into the function map.

This method handles the uniquing of string names and create a <code><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/stablefunctionmap/stablefunctionentry">StableFunctionEntry</a></code> for insertion.

## Private Member Functions

### insert() {#aa4d2586762f7dcfe2dc7bfb0c06902ac}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>void llvm::StableFunctionMap::insert (std::unique&#95;ptr&lt; <a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/stablefunctionmap/stablefunctionentry">StableFunctionEntry</a> &gt; FuncEntry)</>}
  labels = {["inline"]}>
Insert a <code><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/stablefunctionmap/stablefunctionentry">StableFunctionEntry</a></code> into the function map directly.

This method assumes that string names have already been uniqued and the <code><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/stablefunctionmap/stablefunctionentry">StableFunctionEntry</a></code> is ready for insertion.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/cgdata/stablefunctionmap-h/#l00119">119</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/cgdata/stablefunctionmap-h">StableFunctionMap.h</a>.
